mapper.select: select count(*) from stencil_product where product_id=#{product_id} and stencil_node_id=#{stencil_node_id}
select tree_node_id from stencil_product where product_id=#{product_id} and stencil_node_id=#{stencil_node_id}
select fc.table_id as id,rt.tree_node_name as name from func_column fc left join stencil_tree rt on fc.table_id=rt.id where fc.control_id=#{control_id} and fc.func_id=#{func_id} Group By fc.table_id
mapper.delete: delete from stencil_product where product_id=#{product_id} and tree_node_id=#{treeNodeId}
